downloadTitle: Capacity calculator for forensic evidence in Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management
downloadDescription: The spreadsheet can help organizations estimate the amount of GBs needed for their forensic evidence policies configured by admins with appropriate permissions, based on the inputs, such as the number of users, devices, and virtual machines, etc.

downloadFile.name: Capacity calculator for Forensic evidence in Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management (1).xlsx
downloadFile.url: https://download.microsoft.com/download/0/9/a/09a87a42-12a7-41e2-bfad-eb4365f926b8/Capacity calculator for Forensic evidence in Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management (1).xlsx

detailsSection: The spreadsheet can help organizations estimate the amount of GBs needed for their forensic evidence policies configured by admins with appropriate permissions, based on the inputs, such as the number of users, devices, and virtual machines, etc.

installInstructionSection:
• Select the Download button to start the download.
  • The download should start automatically. If prompted, select Save or Save this program to disk.
